c5f8d8a1-4e6b-4d8f-bf4d-1a7f1c8e6d3b.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
c5f8d8a1-4e6b-4d8f-bf4d-1a7f1c8e6d3b.summary: Players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster slayer for hire known as a Witcher. He embarks on a quest to find his missing adopted daughter, who is on the run from the Wild Hunt. The game features an open world and uses a third-person perspective.

a3d2f6b4-5c7d-4622-bb5e-8e2c5f8b9d1a.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
a3d2f6b4-5c7d-4622-bb5e-8e2c5f8b9d1a.summary: Set in 1899, the game follows Arthur Morgan, an outlaw and member of the Van der Linde gang. Players can interact with the open world in various ways, including hunting, fishing, and engaging in gunfights.

b6e4a8c9-2d4f-46d8-8c9a-3a1b5f2e7d6c.title: Cyberpunk 2077
b6e4a8c9-2d4f-46d8-8c9a-3a1b5f2e7d6c.summary: Players assume the role of V, a mercenary in Night City. The game features branching storylines, deep RPG mechanics, and a massive open world filled with cybernetic enhancements and futuristic technology.

d8f9b2e3-1a4c-4f7e-bd3d-9c8e5f6a7d2b.title: Dark Souls III
d8f9b2e3-1a4c-4f7e-bd3d-9c8e5f6a7d2b.summary: A challenging action RPG where players traverse the Kingdom of Lothric, battling powerful enemies and bosses in a dark fantasy world.

e1c6b3d7-5f8a-472c-b4e9-1d7f2a5c6b9e.title: God of War (2018)
e1c6b3d7-5f8a-472c-b4e9-1d7f2a5c6b9e.summary: Kratos and his son Atreus journey through the world of Norse mythology. The game features intense combat, a deep story, and exploration elements.

f2b8c6e3-4d5a-49e7-9f1c-6d8a2b3e5f7c.title: Elden Ring
f2b8c6e3-4d5a-49e7-9f1c-6d8a2b3e5f7c.summary: A massive open-world RPG developed by FromSoftware, blending Souls-like combat with exploration and storytelling crafted with the help of George R.R. Martin.

g7d5f9c2-1e8b-4a6d-b3f7-2c9e4a5b6d8f.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
g7d5f9c2-1e8b-4a6d-b3f7-2c9e4a5b6d8f.summary: Players control Link as he explores the vast open world of Hyrule, solving puzzles, fighting enemies, and uncovering the mystery of Calamity Ganon.

h6e2b3d7-5f9a-4c8d-9f1e-2a7c5d8b6f4e.title: Horizon Zero Dawn
h6e2b3d7-5f9a-4c8d-9f1e-2a7c5d8b6f4e.summary: Players control Aloy, a hunter in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by robotic creatures. The game features a mix of ranged combat, stealth, and crafting.

i3d5b6e7-8f9a-4c2d-1e7f-5a9b3d4f6c8e.title: Minecraft
i3d5b6e7-8f9a-4c2d-1e7f-5a9b3d4f6c8e.summary: A sandbox game that allows players to build, explore, and survive in procedurally generated worlds. Features survival and creative modes.

j5f9d6e3-8b7a-4c2d-1e9f-3a5b4d7f6c8e.title: Doom Eternal
j5f9d6e3-8b7a-4c2d-1e9f-3a5b4d7f6c8e.summary: Players take on the role of the Doom Slayer, battling demonic forces in fast-paced, brutal combat across a variety of intense environments.
